entities.name: halloween
entities.description: Halloween is mentioned as the time when the Goblet of Fire will return the names of the three most worthy students. (Excerpt: 'night, Halloween, the go blet will return...')

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: The Goblet of Fire is a magical object that will be placed in the entrance hall and will choose the champions for the tournament. (Excerpt: 'The goblet will be placed in the entrance hall...')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as saying that he will draw an Age Line around the Goblet of Fire to prevent underage students from competing. (Excerpt: '“To ensure that no underage student yields to temptation,” said Dumbledore...')

entities.name: age line
entities.description: The Age Line is a magical boundary drawn by Dumbledore to prevent underage students from competing. (Excerpt: 'I will be drawing an Age Line around the Goblet of Fire...')

entities.name: champion
entities.description: A champion is a person who has been selected by the Goblet of Fire to compete in the tournament. (Excerpt: 'Once a champion has been selected by the Goblet of Fire...')

entities.name: tournament
entities.description: The tournament is an event that will be held, and students who are chosen as champions must participate in it. (Excerpt: 'This tournament is not to be entered into lightly...')

relationships.description: The Goblet of Fire selects the champions for the tournament. (Excerpt: 'Once a champion has been selected by the Goblet of Fire...')
Dumbledore draws the Age Line around the Goblet of Fire. (Excerpt: 'I will be drawing an Age Line around the Goblet of Fire...')
Champions must participate in the tournament. (Excerpt: 'Once a champion has been selected by the Goblet of Fire, he or she is obliged to see the tournament through to the end...')
